Description:

Exceptional communication and copywriting skills make a strong candidate, as well as experience in corporate communications and project management.ResponsibilitiesLead and develop innovative and engaging internal and external communications campaigns and projects.Plan, develop and oversee the development of all communications activities.
Collaborate across internal teams to generate new ideas and develop meaningful content and narratives.
Develop coordinated schedules and plans, and create and deliver presentations to support planning for corporate communications initiatives.
Plan, edit and write content for a variety of internal and external communications mediums.
Storyboard or translate ideas to the creative team and designers.RequirementsProven experience as a communications manager
Experience in content creation, copywriting and editing
Solid understanding of project management principles
Excellent communication (oral and written) and presentation skills
Outstanding organizational and planning abilities
Proficient command of English
